definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Today, 5 percent of Peace Corps volunteers work in youth development.
sentences.chinese: 今天，和平队有5%的志愿者从事青年发展工作。

sentences.english: like maybe the Peace Corps or Jesuit Volunteer Corps.
sentences.chinese: 像和平队或耶稣会志愿者之类的。

sentences.english: Peace Corps volunteers left Sierra Leone in nineteen ninety-four because of civil war.
sentences.chinese: 和平队志愿者1994年由于内战离开了塞拉利昂。

sentences.english: Kennedy Organization alliance for progress in Latin America and the Peace Corps.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪组织拉丁美洲争取进步同盟与和平队。

sentences.english: Today, Gordy Mengel is a Peace Corps programming and training officer in Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 现在，孟格尔是卢旺达和平队的一名计划及训练主管。

sentences.english: The agency has adapted to a rapidly changing world, Tschetter said.
sentences.chinese: 切特说，和平队也随着迅速变化的世界进行了调整。

sentences.english: As a young man, Chris joined the Peace Corps, and taught English in Morocco.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯年轻时参加了和平队，在摩洛哥教英语。

definition: Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF charity)/Doctors Without Borders
